page.title: 18HOME LIFE
page.content: A washing machine,fridge and colour television are considered the most essential modern appliances in our homes with video recorders and microwave ovens also becoming popular. About half primary age children have a home computer and enjoy playing computerised games.They also like electronic games but dolls including action men are still the most popular toys.Nearly every family has a pet with cats top in popularity followed by dogs and then fish.Children enjoy wearing casual clothes like jeans and track suits but girls like to dress up in skirts to go out.Most families take their main meal together in the evenings.Convenience foods,especially, chips, are often eaten but on Sundays the traditional roast dinner is enjoyed at midday by nearly all families.
